TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DataGridViewImageCellLayout extends System.Enum

summary.span: Consente di specificare il layout di un'immagine contenuta in una classe .

span.span: Specifies the layout for an image contained in a .

remarks.format: ## Examples Esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato l'utilizzo di questo tipo.The following code example illustrates the use of this type. Questo esempio fa parte di un esempio più esaustivo disponibile in [procedura: utilizzare le colonne di immagini nel controllo DataGridView Windows Form](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Work with Image Columns in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe#20](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe/CPP/tictactoe.cpp#20)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe/CS/tictactoe.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe/VB/tictactoe.vb#20)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCellLayout Normal = int32(1)

summary.span: L'immagine è centrata e utilizza la risoluzione nativa.

span.span: The graphic is displayed centered using its native resolution.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCellLayout NotSet = int32(0)

summary.span: La specifica del layout non è stata impostata.

span.span: The layout specification has not been set.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCellLayout Stretch = int32(2)

summary.span: L'immagine è ridotta della percentuale necessaria per adattarla alla larghezza e all'altezza della cella che la contiene.

span.span: The graphic is stretched by the percentages required to fit the width and height of the containing cell.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCellLayout Zoom = int32(3)

summary.span: L'immagine viene ingrandita in modo uniforme fino ad occupare tutta la larghezza e l'altezza della cella che la contiene.

span.span: The graphic is uniformly enlarged until it fills the width or height of the containing cell.
